title: Ground News - Judiciary Chair Jim Jordan does victory lap after massive banks exit $68 trillion UN climate alliance
text: Judiciary Chair Jim Jordan does victory lap after massive banks exit $68 trillion UN climate alliance EXCLUSIVE: House Judiciary Chairman Summary by Fox News [Jim Jordan](https://ground.news/interest/jim-jordan), R-Ohio, is doing a victory lap after major financial institutions announced their departure from a behemoth climate alliance founded at the United Nations. 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] Fox News Judiciary Chair Jim Jordan does victory lap after massive banks exit $68 trillion UN climate alliance EXCLUSIVE: House Judiciary Chairman Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, is doing a victory lap after major financial institutions announced their departure from a behemoth climate alliance founded at the United Nations. 2 hours agoÂ·New York, United StatesRead Full Article Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Not enough coverage to generate an Article Assistant.
